entry.title: $1750 // 1.5BR_PLUS_DEN - H/W Sunset Park - R -N Trains slope greenwood
entry.content:
1.5BR plus Den plus Walk-in-Closet
CHARLES 212.470.0242

PRICED TO RENT
Bright and sunny 1.5 bedroom plus den railroaded apartment in beautiful 2 family owner occupied brownstone. Available now. This is on the top floor (1 flight up). Very nice big kitchen, separate dining room, big bright living room, renovated bathroom, big bay windows in the master bedroom and bonus huge walk in closet! Two blocks from N express train and R train. Great location!SORRY NO PETS

Charles Ega 212.470.0242
